import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import { toast, ToastContainer } from "react-toastify"; import "react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.css"; const URL = "http://localhost:3000"; const Upload_Profile_Private = ({ initialUserData }) => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ InputUserId: "", InputFirstName: "", InputLastName: "", InputPhone: "", InputAltEmail: "", }); useEffect(() => { if (initialUserData.length > 0) { const userData = initialUserData[0]; // Assuming only one user is fetched setFormData({ InputUserId: userData.scsemppri_id, InputFirstName: userData.scsemppri_first_name, InputLastName: userData.scsemppri_last_name, InputPhone: userData.scsemppri_phone, InputAltEmail: userData.scsemppri_alt_email, }); } }, [initialUserData]); const postUserData = async (formData) => { try { const response = await axios.post(URL + "/userPostPrivate", formData); toast.success("Private Data Successfully updated."); console.log(response.data); // Fetch data again after posting if needed } catch (error) { toast.error("Error submitting data. Please try again later."); console.error(error); } }; const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); postUserData(formData); }; return (
PRIVATE DETAILS
Note: This information will not be displayed in public.
